formalpara.title: Figure 12. CDC-42 in neuronal protrusion.
formalpara.para: CDC-42 utilizes multiple pathways to stimulate neuronal protrusion, including the actin-interacting molecules Arp2/3, UNC-34/Enabled, and UNC-115/abLIM, the kinases MIG-15/NIK and PAK-1, and PI3K signaling via the mTORC2 complex.
